tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE real_time_data (
  timestamp DATETIME PRIMARY KEY,
  production_line_id INT,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  pressure DECIMAL,
  speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE production_line_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  line_id INT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 productivity DECIMAL,
 efficiency DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionLinePerformance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    production_time INT,
    efficiency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE RealTimeData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    data_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE LineWorkers (
    worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    worker_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE LineSupervisors (
    supervisor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supervisor_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MachineStatus (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)
